title: Mobile Spectating
body:
Riot, you should definitely add mobile spectating. The app already allows you to view and send messages, however i think it would be a beneficial addition to the app both for a boost in app downloads, and a better following. CHEERS, Youre welcome :)

P.S. maybe an RP boost for coming up with the idea? or better? :P

replies.body: Ayyyyy that's a pretty cool idea TBH!! I'd honestly be pretty stoked if that became a thing as well, but sadly, those devs don't always listen to little poro's such as myself. You should hit up the [**Concepts & Creations**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts) board with this idea!
